name: Sadness pandemic
description: Sadness, the unwanted emotion that people feel at certain times during their lives. Feeling sad occasionally is considered a natural reaction to situations that cause emotional upset or pain. But, we see so many sad faces all around nowadays, that the gegree of sadness across the world is increasing at an alarming rate. Awaken, don't let sadness interfere with your constructive thoughts. Let's resolve to stop being sad and make the world a happy place.
